directions.step:
1. USE CANNED ASPARAGUS.
2. RECONSTITUTE MILK; HEAT TO JUST BELOW BOILING. DO NOT BOIL.
3. BLEND BUTTER OR MARGARINE AND FLOUR TOGETHER; STIR UNTIL SMOOTH.
4. ADD FLOUR MIXTURE TO MILK, STIRRING CONSTANTLY. SIMMER 5 MINUTES OR UNTIL OR UNTIL THICKENED.
5. HEAT ASPARAGUS.
6. POUR SAUCE OVER ASPARAGUS.
Recipe Number: Q00102
SERVING SIZE: 1/2 CUP
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
